New Records: Bam Adebayo nearly achieved a triple-double with 23 points, 9 rebounds, and 10 assists; Tyler Herro scored 32 points, including five consecutive 3-pointers late in the first half
Key Match Events: The Miami Heat never trailed during the game; Trey Murphy III scored 34 points for the Pelicans but the Heat maintained control
Post-Match Reflections: The Pelicans have now lost 15 consecutive road games, the longest streak in NBA history this season
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the 100th meeting between the Heat and Pelicans; the Pelicans are 1-20 in their last 21 games
